buff.name: buffGSKGodMode
buff.help: do not create a recipe to activate this duh. DO NOT PUT SUPER POWERS HERE, this is meant just to protect the player in special moments in a normal gameplay

triggered_effect.help: or it is unplayable at ND lvl 5
or it will kick in as soon god mode ends

buff.name: buffGSKGodModeRespawn
buff.help: do not create a recipe to activate this duh.

triggered_effect.help: it may take some seconds to generate the world in the new location, also about 5s for the engine wakeup animation, and the player may need time to decide to use the teleport to backpack item before dieing again. shall not be enough time to the player get back the backpack

buff.name: buffGSKGodModeFirstSpawn
buff.help: do not create a recipe to activate this duh.

buff.name: buffGSKGodModeNewbie
buff.help: do not create a recipe to activate this duh.

effect_group.help: CoatlessVeteran: this is intended just to keep the above passives about water food and health and anything else new that may take just a few seconds to be stabilized by the engine as was documented

/buffs/buff[@name='buffHealWaterMax']/effect_group[@name='stat is at max but stuffed, convert normally']
/buffs/buff[@name='buffHealWaterMax']/effect_group[@name='stat is at max, convert more slowly']

triggered_effect.help: this goes off by other buffs that check if it has buffIsOnFire. But this way is ok like in not permanently on fire, but actually having some extra heat that burns in the air from time to time.
keep 100 as will also be used for the randomrolls!

triggered_effect.message: [TNM] You fall down while being refreshed by a powerful elixir.

effect_group.help: near death stuff. each shall at most reach ND lvl 5 on maximum possible random occurrences based on initial iGSKRespecDanger and it's decrementation

triggered_effect.help: max danger is 1500 (300 per ND lvl)
max danger is 5.0, it may quickly lower if player has no cold problem. was 0.05
if max is 100, this will result in 100 to 50 ocurrences

effect_group.help: prevent NPCs luring mobs while sneaking

triggered_effect.help: WORKAROUND: at least you can move at night with a follower now TODO: seems overpowered, allow only if player in less than 5m

set.help: was 0.002 (move -20%) by 160 slots inv mod. we get 60 slots (3 lines) on start and 100 available (5 lines). 100*0.006=0.60 = move -60%. This much is to make the player really need to use steroids and create better pockets.
